title: Bahrain Bank Lending Rate
description: Bank Lending Rate in Bahrain increased to 5.29 percent in the third quarter of 2022 from 4.96 percent in the second quarter of 2022. Bank Lending Rate in Bahrain averaged 6.31 percent from 2007 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 9.30 percent in the third quarter of 2007 and a record low of 4.26 percent in the fourth quarter of 2021. This page provides - Bahrain Bank Lending Rate- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Central Bank of Bahrain
